entry.title: About us
entry.summary: Publii doesn't build basic blogs; it offers the tools to create a range of stunning, versatile websites whatever the focus.
entry.content:
Showcase

Publii doesn't build basic blogs; it offers the tools to create a range of stunning, versatile websites whatever the focus. Portfolios, documentation, news and hobbyist sites; whatever the subject, Publii can deliver. Check out the brilliant sites from our community below to see just what can be achieved with the right theme and a dream.

entry.title: Grilled vegetable terrine with tomato sauce
entry.summary: Praesent varius, urna vel consectetur elementum, enim tellus molestie justo, et vehicula quam nulla sit amet mi. Mauris suscipit eros…

Phasellus tortor augue, rutrum vel euismod at, eleifend ac turpis.Phasellus porttitor maximus nisl, vitae sagittis lorem gravida sit amet. Donec augue nulla, eleifend tempus nib.

Ingredients
(makes about 3 servings)
4 large onions, thinly sliced
a handful of cheddar curd, or grated cheddar
2 tbsp mango or orange juice (optional)
spring onions, chopped fine
6 cups chicken or vegetable stock
6 leaves kale, thick ribs trimmed and torn or sliced into slivers
6 tablespoons cr√®me fraiche
4 pieces stale, crusty French bread
1.2kg potatoes, peeled and cut into quarters
1 tsp lemon juice
